price: او یقینا موږ په دې قرآن كې خلكو ته هر قسم بیان کړی دی، خو انسان له هر شي زيات جګړه مار دى.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ صَرَّفۡنَا فِي هَٰذَا ٱلۡقُرۡءَانِ لِلنَّاسِ مِن كُلِّ مَثَلٖۚ وَكَانَ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ أَكۡثَرَ شَيۡءٖ جَدَلٗا

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: walaqad ṣarrafnā fī hādhā al-qur'āni lilnnāsi min kulli mathalin wakāna al-insānu akthara shayin jadalan
